text: William Carvel "Bill" Graham (March 17, 1939 - August 7, 2022) was a Canadian lawyer, law professor, politician, and Chancellor of Trinity College. Graham was Minister of Foreign Affairs, Minister of National Defence, Leader of the Opposition and interim Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada. Graham died on August 7, 2022 in Toronto, Ontario at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Canadian lawyers Category:Politicians from Montreal Category:Privy Councillors (Canada) Category:Leaders of the Opposition (Canada) Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada from Ontario Category:Canadian King's Counsel Category:University of Toronto alumni
title: Bill Graham (Canadian politician)
